short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a clickable icon to CSC PTOs, Prospects, Keepers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for the Conn Smythe Corner fantasy hockey league that adds details not supported on Yahoo front end such as prospects, PTOs, protected players as well as a few stylistic additions to the website.
